body1.title: Visual Impairment Awareness
body1.text: This page describes what visual impairments are.

body2.text: Often centered around a few basic categories, visual impairments represent a spectrum of anyone whose visual condition impacts their ability to successfully complete activities in everyday life [1].

body3.text: According to the World Health Organization these categories are as follows: visual acuity between 6/12 to 6/18 is mild, visual acuity between 6/18 to 6/60 is moderate, visual acuity between 6/60 to 3/60 is severe, and visual acuity worse than 3/60 is blind [7].

body4.text: These classifications are likely to differ between sources, but they represent the general concept.
